member.summary: renders the control as collapsible panel if set to true

member.summary: expands the collapsible on load if set to true

member.summary: Set the option to show/hide the header bar, works if only collapsible is false

member.name: T:WebControls.MilesAuditLogDashboard
member.summary: Author: Sanjog Sharma AuditLog Control for DashBoard Displays Audit Logs in dashboard ordered by changed date Number of items to display is configurable using property "NumberofDisplayItems", default value is 5 ObjectID and KeyID identifies which entity the audit log is for, "Populate" function populates the header and items for the control AuditLog is rendered in collapsible panel but is configurable Counter for AuditLogs is displayed in right, which is shown by default but can be turned off via property "Show Counter"

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesNotesDashboard.ObjectID
member.summary: Author: Sanjog Sharma Notes List Control for DashBoard Displays notes in dashboard ordered by pinned notes and created date Number of items to display is configurable using property "NumberofDisplayItems", default value is 2 ObjectID and KeyID identifies which entity the documents is for, "Populate" function populates the header and items for the control There is icon added for notes/link, if it is a link the icon is clickable and it navigates to the link URL Counter for notes is displayed in right, which is shown by default but can be turned off via property "Show Counter" HeaderText and NavigateURL is configurable.

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesNotesDashboard.InfoPage
member.summary: gets or sets the info page for notes Provide the full path to info page

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesNotesDashboard.IDField
member.summary: gets or sets the id field for notes

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesPicture.DefaultImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the default image url

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesPicture.ImageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the thumnail (display) image

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesPicture.FullSizeImageName
member.summary: Gets or sets the image for the full picture

member.name: P:WebControls.MilesDocumentsDashboard.ObjectID
member.summary: Author: Sanjog Sharma Documents List Control for DashBoard Displays Documents in dashboard ordered by uploaded date Number of items to display is configurable using property "NumberofDisplayItems", default value is 2 ObjectID and KeyID identifies which entity the documents is for, "Populate" function populates the header and items for the control Corresponding document icon is displayed for mostly used documents, and text icon is displayed for others Counter for documents is displayed in right, which is shown by default but can be turned off via property "Show Counter" HeaderText and HeaderNaviationURL is configurable. Provide the DocumentsList page for the object in the HeaderNavigationURL '''
